Makes the bow shoot a volley of arrows instead of just one.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.venom.d: Afflicts poison when you attack a mob.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.heavy_c: When wearing the cursed armor you take more fall damage and sink in water.
Increases velocity of arrows fired from the bow.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.vampiri: Recovers the user a small amount of health when you attack a mob.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.magic_p: Reduces damage from magic such as potion effects.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.destruc: Whenever you break a block with the cursed item it causes a explosion.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.suppres: Nullifies the damage from projectiles shot with the crossbow allowing for positive potion arrows without damage.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.potency: Increases the level of potion effects on potion arrows shot from the crossbow.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.repulsi: Launches mobs that hit the shield backwards.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.mobilit: Reduces the slowness from holding up the shield.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.recover: Speeds up the recovery time after the shield is stunned by an axe.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.counter: Slightly increases damage if you immediately hit a mob after the shield blocks their attack.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.perfect: If you put up the shield right as a mob hit you, the mob is afflicted with heavy slowness and weakness for a moment.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.frost_a: Afflicts slowness when you hit a mob.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.magma_w: Solidifies lava under the player's feet into crusted magma.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.batting: Increases Knockback and damage of the item.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.glory.d: Increases the item's attack damage and speed for each piece of armor you are wearing that is leather or worse.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.punctur: Makes the item's damage deal through armor.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.infesta: Has a chance to summon endermites to fight for you whenever an enemy attacks you
enchantment.modular_enchantments.experie: Increases the amount of exp dropped from mobs killed with this item, and blocks broken with this item.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.smeltin: Smelts ores that are broken with this pickaxe.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.bountif: Increases the amount of crops the drop when broken with this item.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.fragile: Cursed item looses durability at a faster rate.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.pain_cu: Cursed item will hurt the user when used.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.sifting: When you break blocks such as sand and gravel with the item it has a chance to drop nuggets of ores.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.shadowf: Increases the damage of the item for each curse the item has on it.
enchantment.modular_enchantments.utility: Increases the mining speed of the item when being used to break a block it isn't effective for.
